c.order_detail_id, c.order_id, c.sku_id, c.specification, c.supply_id, c.product_id, c.brand_name, c.form_of_drug, c.product_name, c.product_code, c.manufactures_id, c.manufactures, c.product_price, c.product_settlement_price, c.product_count, c.recieve_count, c.remark, c.create_user, date_format(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, c.update_user, date_format(c.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time, c.short_name, c.spu_code, c.promotion_id, c.promotion_name, c.cancel_produce_num c.promotion_collection_id, c.promotion_collection_type, c.preferential_collection_money
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS totalcount FROM t_order_detail WHERE 1=1

SELECT
FROM t_order_detail c, t_order t WHERE 1=1 AND c.order_id=t.order_id AND t.flow_id=#{flowId}
